```{r setup}
library(hw3lm)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
x = matrix(rnorm(3*100), nrow = 100, ncol = 3)
y = matrix(rnorm(1*100), nrow = 100, ncol = 1)
res = linear_regression(x, y)
```

```{r}
res$p_val
```


```{r}
lm_res = lm(y ~ x)
```

```{r}
summary(lm_res)$coefficients[ , 3]
```
